00038 BitmapTriples::BitmapTriples()
00039 {
00040 }
00041 
00042 BitmapTriples::BitmapTriples(Dictionary *dictionary, unsigned int ntriples, unsigned int parsing)
00043 {
00044     this->dictionary = dictionary;
00045     this->parsing = parsing;
00046     this->ntriples = 0;
00047     
00048     graph.resize(ntriples);
00049 }
00050 
00051 BitmapTriples::BitmapTriples(Dictionary *dictionary, unsigned int ntriples, unsigned int parsing, string path)
00052 {
00053     this->dictionary = dictionary;
00054     this->ntriples = ntriples;
00055     this->parsing = parsing;
00056     this->path = path;
00057     
00058     string input = path;
00059     fileY = fopen((input.append(".hdt.triples.Y")).c_str(), "r");
00060     
00061     input = path;
00062     fileZ = fopen((input.append(".hdt.triples.Z")).c_str(), "r");
00063     
00064     input = path;
00065     ifstream fileBY((input.append(".hdt.triples.BY")).c_str());
00066     
00067     input = path;
00068     ifstream fileBZ((input.append(".hdt.triples.BZ")).c_str());
00069     
00070     if (fileBY.good())
00071     {
00072         bitmapY = BitSequence::load(fileBY);
00073         fileBY.close();
00074     }
00075     
00076     if (fileBZ.good())
00077     {
00078         bitmapZ = BitSequence::load(fileBZ);
00079         fileBZ.close();
00080     }
00081 }

00083 void
00084 BitmapTriples::console()
00085 {
00086     cout.precision(4);
00087     vector<string> subcommand;
00088     string command;
00089     char commandChar[256] ;
00090     
00091     string format="ntriples";
00092     string output="output.rdf";
00093     int i=0;
00094     
00095     
00096     cout.precision(4);
00097     cout << endl << "**************************" << endl;
00098     cout << "  Bitmap Triples Console" << endl;
00099     cout << "  ---------------------" << endl;
00100     
00101     while (true){
00102         format="ntriples";
00103         output="salida.rdf";
00104         
00105         cout <<"  Available Operations: " << endl;
00106         cout <<"        serialize                      Serialize HDT to RDF (ntriples by default). " << endl;
00107         cout <<"            -f format                         Output format: ntriples (default), rdfxml, turtle, rdfxml-abbrev, rdfxml-xmp, atom, json-triples, json, dot"<< endl;  
00108         cout <<"            -o --output <file>                Serialize output (output.rdf by default)"<< endl;
00109         cout <<"        ask <BGP>                      SPARQL Ask operation over a given Basic Graph Pattern"<< endl;
00110         /*cout <<"        construct <BGP>            SPARQL construct operation over a given Basic Graph Pattern. "<< endl;
00111         cout <<"            -f format                         Output format: ntriples (default), rdfxml, turtle, rdfxml-abbrev, rdfxml-xmp, atom, json-triples, json, dot"<< endl;  
00112         cout <<"            -o --output <file>                construct output (salida.rdf by default)"<< endl;
00113         */
00114         cout <<"        select <BGP>                   SPARQL select operation over a given Basic Graph Pattern"<< endl;
00115         cout <<"        vocab                          Show vocabulary stats (RDFS,OWL)"<< endl;    
00116         cout <<"        help                           Show this help"<< endl;  
00117         cout <<"        exit                           Exit console mode"<< endl;       
00118         cout <<"   -----------" << endl;
00119             
00120         if (parsing == SPO) 
00121             cout << "    Due to the current SPO parsing, <BGP> must be <S P O> or <S ?P O?> or <S P ?O>" << endl;
00122         else if (parsing == SOP)
00123             cout << "    Due to the current SOP parsing, <BGP> must be <S P O> or <S ?P O?> or <S P ?O>" << endl;
00124         else if (parsing == POS) 
00125             cout << "    Due to the current POS parsing, <BGP> must be <S P O> or <?S P O?> or <?S P O>" << endl;
00126         else if (parsing == PSO)
00127             cout << "    Due to the current PSO parsing, <BGP> must be <S P O> or <?S P O?> or <?S P O> " << endl;
00128         else if (parsing == OSP)
00129             cout << "    Due to the current OSP parsing, <BGP> must be <S P O> or <?S ?P O> or <S ?P O>" << endl;
00130         else if (parsing == OPS)
00131             cout << "    Due to the current OPS parsing, <BGP> must be <S P O> or <?S ?P O> or <S ?P O>" << endl;
00132     
00133         cout << "**************************" << endl;
00134         cout << endl;
00135         cout<<"\n\n$>";
00136 
00137         cin.getline(commandChar,256);
00138         command = commandChar;
00139         
00140         if (command=="")
00141             cout<<"\n Please provide one available command.\n\n";
00142         else
00143         {
00144             //split as space separator
00145             stringExplode(command, " ", &subcommand);
00146             
00147             if (subcommand[0]=="serialize"){ 
00148                 
00149                 for (i=1;i<subcommand.size();){
00150                     //verify arguments              
00151                     if (subcommand[i]=="-f"){
00152                         
00153                         i=i+1;
00154                         if (i<(subcommand.size())){
00155                             if (subcommand[i][0]!='-') //other option
00156                             {
00157                                 format = subcommand[i];
00158                                 if (format!="ntriples" && format!="turtle" && format!="rdfxml-xmp" && format!="rdfxml-abbrev"
00159                                     && format!="rdfxml" && format!="rss-1.0" && format!="atom" && format!="dot"
00160                                     && format!="rss-1.0" && format!="json-triples" && format!="json"){
00161                                     cout<<   "<WARNING> The format:"<<format<<" is possibly not allowed by the serializer.\n\n";
00162                                 } 
00163                                 i=i+1;
00164                             }   
00165                         }
00166                     }
00167                     else if(subcommand[i]=="-o"){
00168                         i=i+1;
00169                         if (i<(subcommand.size())){
00170                             if (subcommand[i][0]!='-') //other option
00171                             {
00172                                 output = subcommand[i];
00173                                 i=i+1;
00174                             }
00175                         }
00176                     }
00177                     else
00178                         i=i+1;
00179                         
00180                 }
00181                 DataTime t1, t2;        
00182                 getTime(&t1);
00183                 bool ok = serialize((char*)output.c_str(),(char*)format.c_str());
00184                 getTime(&t2);
00185                 if (ok)
00186                 {
00187                     cout << "   <OK> The file '" << output << " has been successfully created in ";
00188                     cout << t2.user - t1.user << " seconds." << endl <<  endl;
00189                 }
00190             }else if (subcommand[0]=="ask"){ 
00191                 if (subcommand.size()>=4){
00192                     DataTime t1, t2;
00193                     string q; 
00194                     q.append(subcommand[1]);
00195                     q.append(" ");
00196                     q.append(subcommand[2]);
00197                     q.append(" ");
00198                     q.append(subcommand[3]);
00199                     q.append(" .");
00200                     
00201                     //example: q = "?y <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#Name> .";
00202                     
00203                     getTime(&t1);
00204                     bool ok = ask(q);
00205                     getTime(&t2);
00206                     
00207                     if (ok) 
00208                         cout<< endl << "   " << q << " EXISTS in the dataset";
00209                     else 
00210                         cout<< endl << "   " << q << " NOTEXISTS in the dataset";
00211                     cout << " (" << t2.user - t1.user << " secs.)" << endl <<  endl;
00212                 }
00213                 else{
00214                     cout<<"\n Please provide one available BGP.\n\n";
00215                 }
00216                 
00217                 
00218             }else if (subcommand[0]=="select"){ 
00219                 if (subcommand.size()>=4){
00220                     DataTime t1, t2;
00221                     vector<TripleString> *r;
00222                     string q; 
00223                     q.append(subcommand[1]);
00224                     q.append(" ");
00225                     q.append(subcommand[2]);
00226                     q.append(" ");
00227                     q.append(subcommand[3]);
00228                     q.append(" .");
00229                     
00230                     //example: q = "?y <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#Name> .";
00231                     
00232                     getTime(&t1);
00233                     int ok = select(q,&r);
00234                     getTime(&t2);
00235                     
00236                     if (ok != ERROR)
00237                     {
00238                         cout << "   " << q << " occurs " << ok << " times "<<  endl;
00239 
00240                         // first 100 results
00241                         if (ok > 100){
00242                              ok =100;
00243                              cout << "   showing the first 100 results:"<<  endl;
00244                          }
00245                         
00246                         for (uint i=0; i<ok; i++)
00247                         {
00248                             cout << "[" << i+1 << "] ";
00249                             cout << (*r)[i].x << " ";
00250                             cout << (*r)[i].y << " ";
00251                             cout << (*r)[i].z << " ." << endl;
00252                         }
00253                     }
00254                     else 
00255                         cout<< endl << "   " << q << " NOTEXISTS in the dataset";
00256                     cout << " (" << t2.user - t1.user << " secs.)" << endl <<  endl;
00257                 }
00258                 else{
00259                     cout<<"\n Please provide a available BGP.\n\n";
00260                 }
00261             }else if (subcommand[0]=="exit"){ 
00262                 exit(0);
00263                 }
00264             else if (subcommand[0]=="vocab"){
00265                 vocabStats();
00266             }
00267             else if (subcommand[0]=="help"){
00268                 //nothing to do
00269             }
00270             else {
00271                 cout<<"\n"<<subcommand[0]<<": command not found.\n\n";
00272             }
00273         }
00274         subcommand.clear();
00275     }
00276     
00277     
00278     
00279     
00280     
00281 
00282     
00283     /*
00284     
00285     
00286     getTime(&t1);
00287     ok = select(q,&r);
00288     getTime(&t2);
00289     
00290     if (ok != ERROR)
00291     {
00292         cout << "   " << q << " occurs " << ok << " times ";
00293         cout << "(" << t2.user - t1.user << " secs.)" << endl <<  endl;
00294

00296         if (ok > 15) ok =15;

00299         {

00310 
00311 Query
00312 BitmapTriples::parseQ(string q)
00313 {
00314     TripleString qstring = parseQuery(q);
00315     Query qid;
00316     qid.variables = 0;
00317     
00318     // Transforms strings in IDs: zero IDs are progressively assigned 
00319     // to each variable.
00320     // ...
00321     // Checks the value restricted by the chosen parsing
00322     // The ID values are organizad in the same parsing order.
00323     
00324     switch (parsing)
00325     {
00326         case SPO:
00327             if (qstring.x[0] != '?')
00328             {
00329                 qid.q.x = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00330                 
00331                 
00332                 if (qstring.y[0] != '?') 
00333                 {
00334                     qid.q.y = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00335                 }
00336                 else
00337                 {
00338                     qid.q.y = 0;
00339                     qid.variables++;
00340                 }
00341 
00342                 if (qstring.z[0] != '?')
00343                 {
00344                     if (qid.variables == 0)
00345                         qid.q.z = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.z, VOC_OBJECT);
00346                     else
00347                         qid.variables = ERROR;  
00348                 }
00349                 else
00350                 {
00351                     qid.q.z = 0;
00352                     qid.variables++;
00353                 }
00354             }
00355             else
00356                 qid.variables = ERROR;
00357                 
00358                 
00359             break;
00360         case SOP:
00361             if (qstring.x[0] != '?')
00362             {
00363                 qid.q.x = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00364             
00365                 if (qstring.z[0] != '?')
00366                 {
00367                     qid.q.y = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.z, VOC_OBJECT);
00368                 }
00369                 else
00370                 {
00371                     qid.q.y = 0;
00372                     qid.variables++;
00373                 }
00374             
00375                 if (qstring.y[0] != '?')
00376                 {
00377                     if (qid.variables == 0)
00378                         qid.q.z = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00379                     else
00380                         qid.variables = ERROR;  
00381                 }
00382                 else
00383                 {
00384                     qid.q.z = 0;
00385                     qid.variables++;
00386                 }
00387             }
00388             else
00389                 qid.variables = ERROR;
00390 
00391             break;
00392         case PSO:
00393             if (qstring.y[0] != '?')
00394             {
00395                 qid.q.x = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00396                 
00397                 if (qstring.x[0] != '?')
00398                 {
00399                     qid.q.y = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00400                 }
00401                 else
00402                 {
00403                     qid.q.y = 0;
00404                     qid.variables++;
00405                 }
00406 
00407                 if (qstring.z[0] != '?')
00408                 {
00409                     if (qid.variables == 0)
00410                         qid.q.z = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.y, VOC_OBJECT);
00411                     else
00412                         qid.variables = ERROR;
00413                 }
00414                 else
00415                 {
00416                     qid.q.z = 0;
00417                     qid.variables++;
00418                 }
00419             }
00420             else
00421                 qid.variables = ERROR;
00422             
00423             break;
00424         case POS:
00425             if (qstring.y[0] != '?')
00426             {
00427                 qid.q.x = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00428                 
00429                 if (qstring.z[0] != '?')
00430                 {
00431                     qid.q.y = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.z, VOC_OBJECT);
00432                 }
00433                 else
00434                 {
00435                     qid.q.y = 0;
00436                     qid.variables++;
00437                 }
00438                 
00439                 if (qstring.x[0] != '?')
00440                 {
00441                     if (qid.variables == 0)
00442                         qid.q.z = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00443                     else
00444                         qid.variables = ERROR;
00445                 }
00446                 else
00447                 {
00448                     qid.q.z = 0;
00449                     qid.variables++;
00450                 }
00451             }
00452             else
00453                 qid.variables = ERROR;
00454                     
00455             break;
00456         case OSP:
00457             if (qstring.z[0] != '?')
00458             {
00459                 qid.q.x = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.z, VOC_OBJECT);
00460 
00461                 if (qstring.x[0] != '?')
00462                 {
00463                     qid.q.y = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00464                 }
00465                 else
00466                 {
00467                     qid.q.y = 0;
00468                     qid.variables++;
00469                 }
00470                 
00471                 if (qstring.y[0] != '?')
00472                 {
00473                     if (qid.variables == 0)
00474                         qid.q.z = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00475                     else
00476                         qid.variables = ERROR;
00477                 }
00478                 else
00479                 {
00480                     qid.q.z = 0;
00481                     qid.variables++;
00482                 }
00483             }
00484             else
00485                 qid.variables = ERROR;
00486 
00487             break;
00488         case OPS:
00489             if (qstring.z[0] != '?')
00490             {
00491                 qid.q.x = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.z, VOC_OBJECT);
00492 
00493                 if (qstring.y[0] != '?')
00494                 {
00495                     qid.q.y = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00496                 }
00497                 else
00498                 {
00499                     qid.q.y = 0;
00500                     qid.variables++;
00501                 }
00502 
00503                 if (qstring.x[0] != '?')
00504                 {
00505                     if (qid.variables == 0)
00506                         qid.q.z = dictionary->retrieveID(qstring.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00507                     else
00508                         qid.variables = ERROR;
00509                 }
00510                 else
00511                 {
00512                     qid.q.z = 0;
00513                     qid.variables++;
00514                 }
00515             }
00516             else
00517                 qid.variables = ERROR;
00518                         
00519             break;
00520         default: 
00521             cout << "   <ERROR> Parsing " << parsing << " is not supported" << endl;
00522     }
00523     
00524     return qid;
00525 }
00526 
00527 bool 
00528 BitmapTriples::ask(string q)
00529 {   
00530     bool checkf = false;
00531     Query query = parseQ(q);
00532     
00533     if (query.q.x==ERROR){
00534         cout<<"  - First element was not found in the dictionary:"<<endl;
00535     }
00536     if (query.q.y==ERROR){
00537         cout<<"  - Second element was not found in the dictionary:"<<endl;
00538     }
00539     if (query.q.z==ERROR){
00540         cout<<"  - Third element was not found in the dictionary:"<<endl;
00541     }
00542     if ((query.q.x==ERROR)||(query.q.y==ERROR)||(query.q.z==ERROR)){
00543         return false;
00544     }
00545     
00546     if (query.variables != ERROR)
00547     {       
00548         unsigned int beginY = bitmapY->select1(query.q.x);
00549         unsigned int endY = bitmapY->select1(query.q.x+1);
00550         unsigned int sizeY = endY-beginY-1;
00551     
00552         if (sizeY > 0)
00553         {
00554             if (query.variables == 2)
00555             {
00556                 // In this point we guarantee that exist at least one triple
00557                 // (X, ?y, ?z) -> return true
00558                 checkf = true;
00559             }
00560             else
00561             {
00562                 fseek(fileY, (beginY-query.q.x+1)*INT32, SEEK_SET);
00563                 unsigned int *bufferY = new unsigned int[sizeY];
00564                 size_t s = fread(bufferY, INT32, sizeY, fileY);         
00565                 unsigned int *ptr = lower_bound(bufferY, bufferY+sizeY, query.q.y);
00566                 
00567                 if ((ptr != NULL) && (*ptr == query.q.y))
00568                 {               
00569                     if (query.variables == 1)
00570                     {                   
00571                         // In this point we guarantee that exist at least one 
00572                         // triple (X, Y, ?z) -> return true
00573                         checkf = true;
00574                     }
00575                     else
00576                     {
00577                         unsigned int pY = bitmapY->rank0(beginY) + (ptr-bufferY) + 1;
00578                         unsigned int beginZ = bitmapZ->select1(pY)-pY+1;
00579                         unsigned int endZ = bitmapZ->select1(pY+1)-pY;
00580                         unsigned int sizeZ = endZ-beginZ;
00581                         
00582                         fseek(fileZ, beginZ*INT32, SEEK_SET);
00583                         unsigned int *bufferZ = new unsigned int[sizeZ];
00584                         s = fread(bufferZ, INT32, sizeZ, fileZ);                    
00585                         ptr = lower_bound(bufferZ, bufferZ+sizeZ, query.q.z);
00586                         
00587                         if ((ptr != NULL) && (*ptr == query.q.z))
00588                         {
00589                             // The triple (X, Y, Z) exists in the dataset
00590                             checkf = true;
00591                         }
00592                          
00593                         delete [] bufferZ;
00594                     }
00595                 }
00596                 
00597                 delete [] bufferY;
00598             }
00599         }
00600     }
00601     else
00602     {
00603         cout << "   <WARNING> This query is not currently supported: we are currently working!" << endl;
00604     }
00605     
00606     return checkf;
00607 }
00608 
00609 int 
00610 BitmapTriples::construct(string q)
00611 {
00612     // Esto hay que hacerlo de tal manera que no devuelva un resultado
00613     // plano sino un grafo en HDT (Proyecto de Alberto San Martin)
00614     // Ahora mismo la función "checkAndFindConstruct" no está resuelta
00615     // utilizo SELECT para dar la sensación de resultado :D
00616     // Igualmente SELECT ahora saca por pantalla el resultado, pero
00617     // tendríamos que devolverlo en alguna estructura de datos más o 
00618     // menos eficiente.
00619     vector<TripleString> *triples;
00620     
00621     select(q,&triples);
00622 }
00623 
00624     
00625     
00626 int
00627 BitmapTriples::select(string q, vector<TripleString> **triples)
00628 {   
00629     uint results = 0;
00630     Query query = parseQ(q);
00631     
00632     if (query.q.x==ERROR){
00633         cout<<"  - First element was not found in the dictionary:"<<endl;
00634     }
00635     if (query.q.y==ERROR){
00636         cout<<"  - Second element was not found in the dictionary:"<<endl;
00637     }
00638     if (query.q.z==ERROR){
00639         cout<<"  - Third element was not found in the dictionary:"<<endl;
00640     }
00641     if ((query.q.x==ERROR)||(query.q.y==ERROR)||(query.q.z==ERROR)){
00642         return 0;
00643     }
00644     
00645     if (query.variables != ERROR)
00646     {       
00647         vector<TripleString> *vresult;
00648 
00649         unsigned int beginY = bitmapY->select1(query.q.x);
00650         unsigned int endY = bitmapY->select1(query.q.x+1);
00651         int sizeY = endY-beginY-1;
00652         
00653         if (sizeY > 0)
00654         {           
00655             fseek(fileY, (beginY-query.q.x+1)*INT32, SEEK_SET);
00656             unsigned int *bufferY = new unsigned int[sizeY];
00657             size_t s = fread(bufferY, INT32, sizeY, fileY);
00658             
00659             unsigned int pY, beginZ, endZ;
00660             int sizeZ;
00661             
00662             if (query.variables == 1)
00663             {
00664                 // Retrieving the coordinate Y
00665                 unsigned int *ptr = lower_bound(bufferY, bufferY+sizeY, query.q.y);
00666                 
00667                 if ((ptr != NULL) && (*ptr == query.q.y))
00668                 {
00669                     pY = bitmapY->rank0(beginY) + (ptr-bufferY) + 1;
00670                     beginZ = bitmapZ->select1(pY)-pY+1;
00671                     endZ = bitmapZ->select1(pY+1)-pY;
00672                     sizeZ = endZ-beginZ;
00673                             
00674                     bufferY[0] = *ptr;
00675                     sizeY = 1;
00676                 }
00677                 else
00678                 {
00679                     return results;
00680                 }
00681             }
00682             else
00683             {
00684                 // Retrieving all coordinates Y
00685                 pY = bitmapY->rank0(beginY) + 1;
00686                 beginZ = bitmapZ->select1(pY)-pY+1;
00687                 endZ = bitmapZ->select1(pY+sizeY)-(pY+sizeY-1);
00688                 sizeZ = endZ-beginZ;
00689             }
00690             
00691             // Retrieving coordinates Z
00692             fseek(fileZ, beginZ*INT32, SEEK_SET);
00693             unsigned int *bufferZ = new unsigned int[sizeZ];
00694             s = fread(bufferZ, INT32, sizeZ, fileZ);                    
00695             
00696             // Building a result table
00697             results = sizeZ;
00698             vresult = new vector<TripleString>(results);
00699             
00700             string subject, object, predicate;
00701             uint i=0, readZ=0;
00702 
00703             if (parsing <= SOP) subject = dictionary->retrieveString(query.q.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00704             else if (parsing <= POS) predicate = dictionary->retrieveString(query.q.x, VOC_PREDICATE);
00705             else object = dictionary->retrieveString(query.q.x, VOC_OBJECT);
00706             
00707             for (uint y=1; y<=sizeY; y++)
00708             {
00709                 if ((parsing == PSO) || (parsing == OSP)) subject = dictionary->retrieveString(bufferY[y-1], VOC_SUBJECT);
00710                 else if ((parsing == SPO) || (parsing == OPS)) predicate = dictionary->retrieveString(bufferY[y-1], VOC_PREDICATE);
00711                 else object = dictionary->retrieveString(bufferY[y-1], VOC_OBJECT);
00712                 
00713                 endZ = bitmapZ->select1(pY+y)-(pY+y-1);         
00714                 sizeZ = endZ-beginZ;
00715                 
00716                 for (uint z=1; z<=sizeZ; z++)
00717                 {
00718                     if ((parsing == POS) || (parsing == OPS)) subject = dictionary->retrieveString(bufferZ[readZ], VOC_SUBJECT);
00719                     else if ((parsing == SOP) || (parsing == OSP)) predicate = dictionary->retrieveString(bufferZ[readZ], VOC_PREDICATE);
00720                     else object = dictionary->retrieveString(bufferZ[readZ], VOC_OBJECT);
00721                     
00722                     (*vresult)[readZ].x = subject;
00723                     (*vresult)[readZ].y = predicate;
00724                     (*vresult)[readZ].z = object;
00725 
00726                     readZ++;
00727                 }
00728             
00729                 beginZ = endZ;
00730             }
00731 
00732             delete [] bufferZ;      
00733         }
00734 
00735         *triples = vresult;
00736     }
00737     else
00738     {
00739         results = ERROR;
00740         cout << "   <WARNING> This query is not currently supported: we are currently working!" << endl;
00741     }
00742 
00743     return results;
00744 }
00745 
00746 bool
00747 BitmapTriples::transformToN3()
00748 {   
00749     unsigned int x = 1, y, z;
00750     size_t read_y = 0, read_z = 0;
00751     string subject, predicate, object;
00752     TripleID triple;
00753     
00754     string output = path;
00755     output.append(".fromHDT.n3");
00756     ofstream outFile(output.c_str()); 
00757     
00758     // Variable for traversing the bitmaps
00759     unsigned int xL=0, xR=0, yL=0, yR=0;    
00760     unsigned int yy=1, zz=1, cy, cz;
00761     
00762     while (zz <= ntriples)
00763     {
00764         unsigned int begin = yy;
00765         
00766         // Processing a new X:
00767         xR = bitmapY->select1(x+1);
00768         cy = xR-xL-1;
00769         
00770         unsigned int *Vy = new unsigned int[cy];
00771         read_y += fread(Vy, INT32, cy, fileY);
00772         yy += cy;
00773         
00774         // Processing the set of Ys in X:
00775         yR = bitmapZ->select1(yy);
00776         cz = yR-yL-cy;
00777         
00778         unsigned int *Vz = new unsigned int[cz];
00779         read_z += fread(Vz, INT32, cz, fileZ);
00780         zz += cz;
00781         
00782         // Read values for all pairs (x,y)
00783         unsigned int travL;
00784         unsigned int travR = yL;        
00785         unsigned int count = 0;
00786         
00787         for (int i=0; i<cy; i++)
00788         {
00789             travL = travR;
00790             travR = bitmapZ->select1(begin+i+1);
00791             
00792             for (unsigned int j=0; j<travR-travL-1; j++)
00793             {
00794                 triple = retrieveTriple(x,Vy[i],Vz[count+j]);
00795             
00796                 subject = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00797                 predicate = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00798                 object = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.z, VOC_OBJECT);
00799         
00800                 outFile << subject << " " << predicate << " " << object << " ." << endl;
00801             }
00802             
00803             count += travR-travL-1;
00804         }
00805         
00806         x++;
00807         xL = xR;
00808         yL = yR;
00809         
00810         delete [] Vy;
00811         delete [] Vz;
00812     }
00813     
00814     return true;    
00815 }
00816 
00817 bool
00818 BitmapTriples::serialize(char *output, char *format)
00819 {   
00820     unsigned int x = 1, y, z;
00821     RDFSyntaxMediator rdfmediator;
00822     ofstream outFile;
00823     
00824     bool n3=true;
00825     if (strcmp(format,"ntriples")!=0){
00826         n3=false;
00827         rdfmediator.init_serialize(output,format);
00828     }
00829     else
00830     {
00831         outFile.open(output); 
00832     }
00833     
00834     
00835     size_t read_y = 0, read_z = 0;
00836     string subject, predicate, object;
00837     TripleID triple;
00838     
00839     // Variable for traversing the bitmaps
00840     unsigned int xL=0, xR=0, yL=0, yR=0;    
00841     unsigned int yy=1, zz=1, cy, cz;
00842     
00843     while (zz <= ntriples)
00844     {
00845         unsigned int begin = yy;
00846         
00847         // Processing a new X:
00848         xR = bitmapY->select1(x+1);
00849         cy = xR-xL-1;
00850         
00851         unsigned int *Vy = new unsigned int[cy];
00852         read_y += fread(Vy, INT32, cy, fileY);
00853         yy += cy;
00854         
00855         // Processing the set of Ys in X:
00856         yR = bitmapZ->select1(yy);
00857         cz = yR-yL-cy;
00858         
00859         unsigned int *Vz = new unsigned int[cz];
00860         read_z += fread(Vz, INT32, cz, fileZ);
00861         zz += cz;
00862         
00863         // Read values for all pairs (x,y)
00864         unsigned int travL;
00865         unsigned int travR = yL;        
00866         unsigned int count = 0;
00867         
00868         for (int i=0; i<cy; i++)
00869         {
00870             travL = travR;
00871             travR = bitmapZ->select1(begin+i+1);
00872             
00873             for (unsigned int j=0; j<travR-travL-1; j++)
00874             {
00875                 triple = retrieveTriple(x,Vy[i],Vz[count+j]);
00876             
00877                 subject = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00878                 predicate = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00879                 object = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.z, VOC_OBJECT);
00880         
00881                 //outFile 
00882                 if (n3==true){
00883                     outFile << subject << " " << predicate << " " << object << " ." << endl;
00884                 }
00885                 else{
00886                     rdfmediator.serialize_statement(subject,predicate,object);
00887                 }
00888             }
00889             
00890             count += travR-travL-1;
00891         }
00892         
00893         x++;
00894         xL = xR;
00895         yL = yR;
00896         
00897         delete [] Vy;
00898         delete [] Vz;
00899     }
00900     
00901     if (n3==true){
00902         if (outFile.good()) outFile.close();
00903     }
00904     else
00905         rdfmediator.end_serialize();
00906     
00907     return true;    
00908 }
00909     
00910 void
00911 BitmapTriples::vocabStats()
00912 {   
00913     unsigned int x = 1, y, z;
00914     size_t read_y = 0, read_z = 0;
00915     string subject, predicate, object;
00916     TripleID triple;
00917     
00918     string rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#";
00919     string rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#";
00920     string owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#";
00921     
00922     string rdf_type = "<http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type>";
00923     
00924     string subClass="<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#subClassOf>";
00925     string subProp="<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#subPropertyOf>";
00926     
00927     vector<MINIPAIR> triplesSubClass;
00928     vector<MINIPAIR> triplesSubProp;
00929     
00930     MiniHashTable countVocab;
00931     countVocab.inithashtable((ntriples/10)+1,true);//ten per cent of number of triples(1 minimum)
00932     
00933     int pos_separator,i;
00934     string substring="";
00935     
00936         
00937     // Variable for traversing the bitmaps
00938     unsigned int xL=0, xR=0, yL=0, yR=0;    
00939     unsigned int yy=1, zz=1, cy, cz;
00940     
00941     while (zz <= ntriples)
00942     {
00943         unsigned int begin = yy;
00944         
00945         // Processing a new X:
00946         xR = bitmapY->select1(x+1);
00947         cy = xR-xL-1;
00948         
00949         unsigned int *Vy = new unsigned int[cy];
00950         read_y += fread(Vy, INT32, cy, fileY);
00951         yy += cy;
00952         
00953         // Processing the set of Ys in X:
00954         yR = bitmapZ->select1(yy);
00955         cz = yR-yL-cy;
00956         
00957         unsigned int *Vz = new unsigned int[cz];
00958         read_z += fread(Vz, INT32, cz, fileZ);
00959         zz += cz;
00960         
00961         // Read values for all pairs (x,y)
00962         unsigned int travL;
00963         unsigned int travR = yL;        
00964         unsigned int count = 0;
00965         
00966         for (int i=0; i<cy; i++)
00967         {
00968             travL = travR;
00969             travR = bitmapZ->select1(begin+i+1);
00970             
00971             for (unsigned int j=0; j<travR-travL-1; j++)
00972             {
00973                 triple = retrieveTriple(x,Vy[i],Vz[count+j]);
00974             
00975                 //subject = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00976                 predicate = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00977                 //object = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.z, VOC_OBJECT);
00978             
00979                 
00980                 pos_separator = predicate.find(rdf);
00981                 
00982                 if (pos_separator>0)
00983                 {
00984                     countVocab.hashupdate((char*)predicate.c_str()); //update or insert
00985                 }
00986                 else{
00987                     pos_separator = predicate.find(rdfs);
00988                     if (pos_separator>0)
00989                     {
00990                         countVocab.hashupdate((char*)predicate.c_str()); //update or insert
00991                         
00992                         //check for subclass, suproperty
00993                         if (predicate==subClass){
00994                             MINIPAIR pairFind;
00995                             pairFind.source = triple.x;
00996                             pairFind.target = triple.z;
00997                             triplesSubClass.push_back(pairFind);
00998                         }
00999                         else if (predicate == subProp){
01000                             MINIPAIR pairFind;
01001                             pairFind.source = triple.x;
01002                             pairFind.target = triple.z;
01003                             triplesSubProp.push_back(pairFind);
01004                         }
01005                     }
01006                     else{
01007                         pos_separator = predicate.find(owl);
01008                         if (pos_separator>0)
01009                         {
01010                             countVocab.hashupdate((char*)predicate.c_str()); //update or insert
01011                         }
01012                     }
01013                 }
01014                 
01015             }
01016             
01017             count += travR-travL-1;
01018         }
01019         
01020         x++;
01021         xL = xR;
01022         yL = yR;
01023         
01024         delete [] Vy;
01025         delete [] Vz;
01026     }
01027     
01028     //iterate over hash and print results
01029     
01030     cout<<"    +List of Vocab Predicates:\n";
01031     MINIHASHREC* predicateRetrieve;
01032     int countRDF=0, countRDFS=0,countOWL=0, countRDF_type=0;
01033     for (i=0;i<countVocab.TSIZE;i++)
01034     {
01035         predicateRetrieve = countVocab.get(i);
01036         if (predicateRetrieve!=NULL){
01037             cout<<"       " << predicateRetrieve->word<<" ; " << predicateRetrieve->id <<"\n"; 
01038             predicate = predicateRetrieve->word;
01039             pos_separator = predicate.find(rdf);
01040             if (pos_separator>0)
01041             {
01042                 countRDF+= predicateRetrieve->id ;
01043                 if (predicate==rdf_type){
01044                     countRDF_type+= predicateRetrieve->id ;
01045                 }
01046             }
01047             else{
01048                 pos_separator = predicate.find(rdfs);
01049                 if (pos_separator>0)
01050                 {
01051                     countRDFS+= predicateRetrieve->id ;
01052                 }
01053                 else{
01054                     pos_separator = predicate.find(owl);
01055                     if (pos_separator>0)
01056                     {
01057                         countOWL+= predicateRetrieve->id ;
01058                     }
01059                 }
01060             }
01061             
01062             //verify next
01063             while (predicateRetrieve->next!=NULL)
01064             {
01065                 predicateRetrieve = predicateRetrieve->next;
01066                 cout<<"       " << predicateRetrieve->word<<" ; " << predicateRetrieve->id <<"\n"; 
01067                 predicate = predicateRetrieve->word;
01068                 pos_separator = predicate.find(rdf);
01069                 if (pos_separator>0)
01070                 {
01071                     countRDF+= predicateRetrieve->id ;
01072                     if (predicate==rdf_type){
01073                         countRDF_type+= predicateRetrieve->id ;
01074                     }
01075                 }
01076                 else{
01077                     pos_separator = predicate.find(rdfs);
01078                     if (pos_separator>0)
01079                     {
01080                         countRDFS+= predicateRetrieve->id ;
01081                     }
01082                     else{
01083                         pos_separator = predicate.find(owl);
01084                         if (pos_separator>0)
01085                         {
01086                             countOWL+= predicateRetrieve->id ;
01087                         }
01088                     }
01089                 }
01090             }   
01091         }
01092     }
01093     
01094     cout<<"    +Count of Vocab Predicates:\n";
01095     cout<<"       +RDF (not type):"<<countRDF-countRDF_type<<"\n";
01096     cout<<"          -ratio(rdf/ntriples):"<<(float)(countRDF-countRDF_type)/ntriples<<"\n";
01097     cout<<"       +RDF:type:"<<countRDF_type<<"\n";
01098     cout<<"          -ratio(rdf:type/ntriples):"<<(float)countRDF_type/ntriples<<" (rdftype/ntriples"<<countRDF_type<<" of them are rdf:type)\n";
01099     cout<<"       +RDFS:"<<countRDFS<<"\n";
01100     cout<<"          -ratio(rdfs/ntriples):"<<(float)countRDFS/ntriples<<"\n";
01101     cout<<"       +OWL:"<<countOWL<<"\n";
01102     cout<<"          -ratio(owl/ntriples):"<<(float)countOWL/ntriples<<"\n";
01103     cout<<"    +Total triples: "<<ntriples<<"\n";
01104     cout<<"    +Different Predicates: "<<dictionary->getNpredicates()<<"\n\n\n";
01105     
01106     //check subprop and subclass
01107     cout<<"    +Count of Subclass Predicates (would crash with cycles):\n";
01108     
01109     if (triplesSubClass.size()>0){
01110         sort(triplesSubClass.begin(),triplesSubClass.end(), BitmapTriples::pairSort);
01111     
01112         
01113         
01114         MiniHashTable subclassLengths;
01115         subclassLengths.inithashtable(triplesSubClass.size());
01116         int length=0, maxlength=0, totallength=0, minlength=500000,numelements=0; 
01117         
01118                 
01119         for (i=0;i< triplesSubClass.size();i++){
01120             if (i ==0){         
01121                 length = getLength(&triplesSubClass,triplesSubClass[i].source,&subclassLengths);
01122                 //cout<<triplesSubClass[i].source <<" length:"<< length<<endl;  
01123                 numelements++;      
01124             }else if (triplesSubClass[i].source!=triplesSubClass[i-1].source){
01125                 length = getLength(&triplesSubClass,triplesSubClass[i].source,&subclassLengths);
01126                 //cout<<triplesSubClass[i].source <<" length:"<< length<<endl;          
01127                 numelements++;
01128             }
01129             if (length>maxlength)
01130                 maxlength=length;
01131             if (length<minlength)
01132                 minlength=length;
01133             totallength += length;
01134         }
01135         cout<<"       -Max length:"<<maxlength<<"\n";
01136         cout<<"       -Min length:"<<minlength<<"\n";
01137         cout<<"       -Mean length:"<<(float)totallength/numelements<<"\n";
01138 
01139         
01140     }
01141     cout<<"    +Count of SubProp Predicates (would crash with cycles):\n";
01142     if (triplesSubProp.size()>0){
01143         sort(triplesSubProp.begin(),triplesSubProp.end(), BitmapTriples::pairSort);
01144         int length=0, maxlength=0, totallength=0, minlength=500000,numelements=0; 
01145         MiniHashTable subpropLengths;
01146         subpropLengths.inithashtable(triplesSubProp.size());
01147         for (i=0;i< triplesSubProp.size();i++){
01148             if (i ==0){         
01149                 length = getLength(&triplesSubProp,triplesSubProp[i].source,&subpropLengths);
01150                 //cout<<triplesSubClass[i].source <<" length:"<< length<<endl;  
01151                 numelements++;      
01152             }else if (triplesSubProp[i].source!=triplesSubProp[i-1].source){
01153                 length = getLength(&triplesSubProp,triplesSubProp[i].source,&subpropLengths);
01154                 //cout<<triplesSubClass[i].source <<" length:"<< length<<endl;          
01155                 numelements++;
01156             }
01157             if (length>maxlength)
01158                 maxlength=length;
01159             if (length<minlength)
01160                 minlength=length;
01161             totallength += length;
01162         }
01163         cout<<"       -Max length:"<<maxlength<<"\n";
01164         cout<<"       -Min length:"<<minlength<<"\n";
01165         cout<<"       -Mean length:"<<(float)totallength/numelements<<"\n";
01166     }
01167     
01168     
01169 }   
01170 
01171 int 
01172 BitmapTriples::getLength(vector<minipair> * triplesSub,int current, MiniHashTable *subLengths){
01173 
01174     //cout<<"Entering getlength for:"<<current<<endl;
01175     //fflush(stdout);
01176     unsigned int first=0;
01177     unsigned int next = 0;
01178     string firstString="",nextString="";
01179     int pos = FindTransition(*triplesSub,current);  //binary search
01180     int maxlength=0, length=0 ;
01181     MINIHASHREC *recordRetrieve;
01182     if (pos<0) 
01183         return 0; //no transition
01184     while (pos<triplesSub->size()){
01185         first = triplesSub->at(pos).source;
01186         if (first!=current)
01187             break;
01188         next = triplesSub->at(pos).target;
01189         //cout<<"next:"<<next<<endl;
01190         //fflush(stdout);
01191         sprintf((char*)firstString.c_str(),"%d",first) ;
01192         sprintf((char*)nextString.c_str(),"%d",next) ;
01193         recordRetrieve = subLengths->hashsearch((char*)nextString.c_str());
01194         if (recordRetrieve!=NULL){
01195             length = recordRetrieve->id;
01196         }
01197         else{
01198             length = getLength(triplesSub,next,subLengths)+1;
01199         }
01200         if (length>maxlength){
01201             subLengths->hashinsert((char*)firstString.c_str(),length);
01202             maxlength = length;
01203         }
01204         pos++;
01205     }
01206     return maxlength;
01207 }
01208     
01209 unsigned int
01210 BitmapTriples::write(vector<TripleID> &graph, string path)
01211 {
01212     string output = path;
01213     FILE *fileY = fopen((output.append(".hdt.triples.Y")).c_str(), "w+");
01214     
01215     output = path;
01216     FILE *fileZ = fopen((output.append(".hdt.triples.Z")).c_str(), "w+");
01217     
01218     unsigned int repeated = 0;
01219     unsigned int x = graph[0].x, y = graph[0].y, z = 0;
01220     
01221     unsigned int ys = 1, zs = 0;
01222     unsigned int tys = 0, tzs = 0;
01223     vector<unsigned int> v_ys, v_zs;
01224     
01225     fwrite(&y,INT32,1,fileY);
01226     
01227     for (unsigned int i=0; i<graph.size(); i++)
01228     {
01229         if (x == graph[i].x)
01230         {
01231             if (y == graph[i].y)
01232             {
01233                 if (z != graph[i].z)
01234                 {
01235                     z = graph[i].z;             
01236                     
01237                     fwrite(&z,INT32,1,fileZ);
01238                     zs++;
01239                 }
01240                 else
01241                 {
01242                     repeated++;
01243                 }
01244             }
01245             else
01246             {
01247                 // Change of Y coordinate
01248                 y = graph[i].y; z = graph[i].z;
01249                 
01250                 fwrite(&y,INT32,1,fileY);
01251                 fwrite(&z,INT32,1,fileZ);
01252                 
01253                 ys++;
01254                 v_zs.push_back(zs);
01255                 tzs += zs; zs = 1;
01256             }
01257         }
01258         else
01259         {
01260             // Change of X and Y coordinates
01261             x = graph[i].x; y = graph[i].y; z = graph[i].z;
01262             
01263             fwrite(&y,INT32,1,fileY);
01264             fwrite(&z,INT32,1,fileZ);
01265             
01266             v_ys.push_back(ys);
01267             tys += ys; ys = 1;
01268             v_zs.push_back(zs);
01269             tzs += zs; zs = 1;
01270         }
01271     }
01272     
01273     v_ys.push_back(ys); tys += ys; 
01274     v_zs.push_back(zs); tzs += zs;
01275     
01276     fclose(fileY);
01277     fclose(fileZ);
01278     
01279     BitString *bsy = new BitString(tys+v_ys.size()+1);
01280     buildBitString(&bsy, &v_ys, v_ys.size());
01281     
01282     BitString *bsz = new BitString(tzs+v_zs.size()+1);
01283     buildBitString(&bsz, &v_zs, v_zs.size());
01284     
01285     // Building bitsequences
01286     BitSequence *bitmapY = new BitSequenceRG(*bsy, 20);
01287     BitSequence *bitmapZ = new BitSequenceRG(*bsz, 20);
01288     
01289     delete bsy; delete bsz;
01290     
01291     output = path;
01292     output.append(".hdt.triples.BY");
01293     ofstream fp1(output.c_str());
01294     
01295     output = path;
01296     output.append(".hdt.triples.BZ");
01297     ofstream fp2(output.c_str());
01298     
01299     if (fp1.good())
01300     {
01301         bitmapY->save(fp1);     
01302         fp1.close();
01303     }
01304     
01305     if (fp2.good())
01306     {
01307         bitmapZ->save(fp2);
01308         fp2.close();
01309     }
01310     
01311     return graph.size()-repeated;
01312 }
01313 
01314 unsigned int 
01315 BitmapTriples::write(string path)
01316 {   
01317     return BitmapTriples::write(this->graph, path);
01318 }
01319 
01320 void 
01321 BitmapTriples::buildBitString(BitString **bs, vector<uint> *v, uint elems)
01322 {
01323     (*bs)->setBit(0, true);
01324     uint pos = 0;
01325         
01326     for (uint i=0; i<elems; i++)
01327     {
01328         (*bs)->setBit((*v)[i]+pos+1, true);
01329         pos += (*v)[i]+1;
01330     }
01331 }
01332 
01333 bool
01334 BitmapTriples::loadGraphMemory(){
01335     cout << "BitmapTriples::loadGraphMemory() not implemented" <<endl;
01336     return false;
01337 }
01338 
01339 BitmapTriples::~BitmapTriples()
01340 {
01341     delete bitmapY;
01342     delete bitmapZ;
01343 }
